alert.note: Alert for Beaufort; Charleston; Coastal Colleton; Coastal Jasper; Dorchester; Inland Berkeley; Tidal Berkeley (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Charleston (the Southern end of South Carolina and Eastern Georgia)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued December 16 at 10:41PM EST until December 17 at 8:00PM EST by NWS Charleston
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT FROM 6 AM TO 8 PM EST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Northeast winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 45 mph expected. * WHERE...Portions of southeast Georgia and southeast South Carolina. * WHEN...From 6 AM to 8 PM EST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Even higher winds will be possible on the elevated bridges and overpasses across the Charleston and Savannah Metro Areas and the exposed bridges heading to the barrier islands.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Beaufort; Charleston; Coastal Colleton; Coastal Jasper; Dorchester; Inland Berkeley; Tidal Berkeley
